alert.note: Alert for Haines Borough and Lynn Canal (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 03 at 10:26AM AKDT until April 03 at 2:00PM AKDT by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM AKDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 2 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph in afternoon. * WHERE...Haines. * WHEN...Until 2 PM AKDT this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heavy rain rates have allowed for precipitation to change to snow. A localized band of heavy snow is moving through upper lynn canal. Storm spotters report that 2 inches of snow has already fallen since 8 AM. Snow is expected to continue over the next few hours has the band moves northward.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
